fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, Trade, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Borders and Security, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Canada EU Trade Agreement ; Strategic Partnership Agreement between EU and Canada ; Investment protection and all transatlantic issues ; Trade negotiations negotiations with third countries
organisation_name: Canada EU Trade and Investment Association (CEUTIA)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
CEUTIA is the first cross-sector industry association established in Brussels which is focused exclusively on advancing and promoting Canadian and EU trade and investment interests. 
​ 
CEUTIA aims to promote a growth-orientated business and investment climate for Canadian and European businesses from small to larger organisations. 
​ 
CEUTIA  promotes CETA and ensure business and interested parties reap its benefits.
